title: Damned whores and evil bitches: prostitution in Australia 1788-1988
creator_credit: Rosa Colosimo and Rosa Colosimo Productions
brief_description: Australia’s founding mothers arrived in 1788 and their legacy continues to thrive as a multi million dollar industry. A revealing expose of prostitution, the oldest profession, from colonial to modern times and its impact on Australian society through dramatic re-enactments, archival material, contemporary footage and interviews. Narrated by Tracy Harvey.
